name: Tokimeki Memorial 2: EVS Append Disc 3
description:
The Tokimeki Memorial 2 EVS Append Disc was published on three additional discs for Tokimeki Memorial 2 to allow the game's EVS (Emotional Voice System) to be available for the different girls. The EVS is a system that allows the girls to actually pronounce the protagonist's name. Only two of the girls, Hikari Hinamoto and Kasumi Asou, have EVS in the base game, and the append discs contain the voices for all the others, except Maeka Kudanshita who never uses the protagonist's name. The discs were included in the Tokimeki Memorial 2 magazine Hibikino Watcher, each disc includes the data for three additional girls, shown on the cover of the corresponding issue:
  • Disc 3 contains the following girls:
    • Maho Shirayuki
    • Mei Ij?in
    • Sumire Nozaki
